forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 61F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers tapering off in the evening with foggy conditions overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening then fog developing overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds light and variable.
